ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of LINDA HART of Toronto, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective April 3, 2017.
